text:
Hi Community,
These two pages are made in HubSpot and seem to be using the same styling but the navigation appears differently when you hover over the word "dining" Any idea why?
Correct format:<https://news.weareblooming.com/careers/gastvrouw-/-gastheer>
InCorrect Format:<https://news.weareblooming.com/careers#vacatures>
It looks like you are missing a div in the one that isnâ€™t working
if you put `<div class="menu-inner-div">` inside your `ul` it will work
